con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://mcc.org/azuremail/sender" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://mcc.org/azuremail/sender" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://mcc.org/azuremail/sender"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://mcc.org/azuremail/sender" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="mailSenderRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="config" type="tns:config"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="message" type="tns:message"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="mailSenderResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="response" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="config"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="clientId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="clientSecret" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="tenantId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="scopes" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="callTimeout" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="connectTimeout" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="readTimeout" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="writeTimeout" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="message"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="from" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="to" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="subject" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="contentType" type="tns:bodyType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="body" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="attachments" type="tns:attachments"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="bodyType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TEXT"/> <xs:enumeration value="HTML"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="attachments"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="attachment" type="tns:attachment"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="attachment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="contentType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="binary" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="mailSenderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mailSenderResponse" name="mailSenderResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="mailSenderRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:mailSenderRequest" name="mailSenderRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="azurePort"> <wsdl:operation name="mailSender"> <wsdl:input message="tns:mailSenderRequest" name="mailSenderRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:mailSenderResponse" name="mailSenderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="azurePortSoap11" type="tns:azurePort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="mailSender"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="mailSenderRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="mailSenderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="azurePortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:azurePortSoap11" name="azurePortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/services/v1"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sen="http://mcc.org/azuremail/sender"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sen:mailSenderRequest> <sen:config> <sen:clientId>847d79d0-2106-43e8-b604-3cf51dbc2838</sen:clientId> <sen:clientSecret>vsn8Q~lpHgTqqhmoqe4G39UxgZh.Ad8CYTY3dcHZ</sen:clientSecret> <sen:tenantId>b8b6efb6-d71a-4c67-8933-c3ab478521d7</sen:tenantId> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <sen:scopes>https://graph.microsoft.com/.default</sen:scopes> <sen:callTimeout>60</sen:callTimeout> <sen:connectTimeout>60</sen:connectTimeout> <sen:readTimeout>60</sen:readTimeout> <sen:writeTimeout>60</sen:writeTimeout> </sen:config> <sen:message> <sen:from>vendors@example-customer.com</sen:from> <sen:to>marcosolimpia@gmail.com</sen:to> <sen:subject>teste Azure</sen:subject> <sen:contentType>TEXT</sen:contentType> <sen:body>mensagem</sen:body> <sen:attachments> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <sen:attachment> <sen:name>testearquivo.txt</sen:name> <sen:contentType>text/plain</sen:contentType> <sen:binary>dGVzdGUgZGUgYXBsaWNhw6fDo28=</sen:binary> </sen:attachment> </sen:attachments> </sen:message> </sen:mailSenderRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
